
```{r}
# Load DT package
library(DT)

# Sample dataset
data <- mtcars

# Create interactive DT table
datatable(
  data,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 10,
    autoWidth = TRUE,
    searchHighlight = TRUE
  ),
  filter = 'top',      # Adds filters for each column
  caption = htmltools::tags$caption(
    style = 'caption-side: top; text-align: left;',
    'Table 1: ', htmltools::strong('Interactive Table with DT')
  )
)

```

```{r}
# Load reactable
library(reactable)

# Sample dataset
data <- iris

# Create an interactive table with custom styling
reactable(
  data,
  searchable = TRUE,
  filterable = TRUE,
  pagination = TRUE,
  defaultPageSize = 5,
  highlight = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE,
  bordered = TRUE,
  columns = list(
    Species = colDef(name = "Iris Species", align = "center"),
    Sepal.Length = colDef(format = colFormat(digits = 2))
  ),
  theme = reactableTheme(
    borderColor = "#E0E0E0",
    stripedColor = "#f5f5f5",
    highlightColor = "#e3f2fd",
    cellPadding = "6px 12px",
    style = list(fontFamily = "Arial", fontSize = "14px")
  )
)

```
